title: 13 Flowers Foods bakeries attain 2022 ENERGY STAR certification - Snack Food & Wholesale Bakery
summary: Flowers Foods, Inc. has earned ENERGY STAR certification for 13 of its bakeries in 2022, with many bakeries receiving the certification multiple times. The company has achieved a 22% reduction in greenhouse gas emissions since 2015 through various energy-saving measures, such as LED lighting, compressed air upgrades, and heat recovery projects.
product_or_process: ENERGY STAR certification, LED lighting, compressed air upgrades, heat recovery projects
likely_naics_codes: ['311811 - Bakeries, Bread and Roll', '561421 - Environmental Consulting Services', '423820 - Merchant Wholesalers, Durable Goods,  nec', '517210 - Software Publishers']
greenwashing: The article describes genuine efforts to reduce energy consumption and emissions, and there is no evidence of greenwashing.
